email_content:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

I hope you are well. I am writing to provide an overview of our department’s current compliance status following our recent internal review.

• Policy Review – We completed a line-by-line review of the latest international-student regulations issued this quarter. No discrepancies were identified between the new requirements and our existing practices.

• Faculty & Staff Updates – All faculty and advisors received a briefing memo last week detailing the changes. Attendance was recorded and everyone has acknowledged receipt and understanding.

• Documentation – Required forms, handbooks, and webpages were updated within 48 hours of the policy release. Archived versions have been retained for audit purposes.

• Ongoing Monitoring – We established a standing monthly checkpoint to track any additional guidance from your office and to verify continued compliance.

At this time, we are fully aligned with all current regulations and do not have any outstanding corrective actions.

Please let me know if you would like further detail or supporting documentation.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Title]
